register.notCitizenship: I am neither citizen nor resident of country whose law limits or forbids to participate in Initial Coin Offerings, Security Token Offering or token sales.
register.newsletter.terms: I agree for my personal data to be processed for the purpose of receiving a newsletter.
register.footer.info: Your email address (which is also your login) is necessary for us to provide you our services. If you do not enter this data, you will not be able to use the platform. The controller of your personal data is Sapiency Sp. z o.o. seated in Krak√≥w, 1 Lekarska Street, Tax Number: 9452228249. Remember that you can always access, correct or demand to delete your personal data or file a complaint to a supervisory authority.
